title: Specific Texts for High School English Classes

content.question: Write an essay that synthesizes material from at least three of the sources and develops your position on whether or not there should be specific texts that all students of high school English must read.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that synthesizes material from at least three of the sources and develops your position on whether or not there should be specific texts that all students of high school English must read.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Write introductions and conclusions appropriate to the purpose and context of the rhetorical situation.
